description:
•	Love Calculator is now available in Palm.
•	Do you have huge crush on your high school mate or colleague or neighbor and you want to know whether approaching her/him would work? Know what is the reality by using best love calculator and getting the secret in folded? 
•	By using this Love calculator you can test the amount of romance present between you and your partner.
•	 This app also tells about the love compatibility ratio and analysis.
